title: Automated vs Human Evaluation Matrix MicroSim
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Interactive 2x2 matrix distinguishing evaluation criteria suitable for automation versus human judgment
description: An interactive p5.js MicroSim presenting a 2x2 matrix with Evaluation Type (Automated/Human) on the horizontal axis and Criteria Type (Objective/Subjective) on the vertical axis. Quadrants are Fully Automated (green), Human-Assisted Automation (blue), Automation-Assisted Human (yellow), and Fully Human (orange). Features hover tooltips for criteria descriptions, quadrant selection, and a workflow toggle showing typical evaluation flow.
source: Original creation for automating instructional design textbook
relation: Part of the Automating Instructional Design intelligent textbook
coverage: Educational technology, instructional design, quality assurance, automated testing, human evaluation
audience: Instructional designers, educators, developers, quality assurance specialists
technicalRequirements: Modern web browser with JavaScript enabled
